n = int(input())
s = input()

count = 0

for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i] == "A" and s[i + 1] == "B" and s[i + 2] == "C":
        count += 1

print(count)

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline


def main():
    N = int(input())
    S = input().rstrip()

    print(S.count("ABC"))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
